original_text: In speaking of a new covenant, he makes the first one obsolete. And what is becoming obsolete and growing old is ready to vanish away.
korean_text: 새 언약이라 말씀하셨으매 첫 것은 낡아지게 하신 것이니 낡아지고 쇠하는 것은 없어져 가는 것이니라

sentences.original_text: In speaking of a new covenant
he makes the first one obsolete
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 첫 번째 것을 낡게 만듭니다

sentences.original_text: And what is becoming obsolete and growing old
